dcterms:creator: G. Krishna
C. Tran
M. Carnahan
A. Tewfik
dcterms:description: Dataset A consists of simultaneous speech and EEG recordings from 10 subjects recorded in absence of externally created background noise, with a background noise of 40 dB due to lab ventilation.
dcterms:title: Dataset A

dcterms:creator: G. Krishna
C. Tran
M. Carnahan
A. Tewfik
dcterms:description: Dataset B consists of simultaneous speech and EEG recordings from 8 subjects recorded in presence of external background noise of 65 dB.
dcterms:title: Dataset B
